content: Prof. Bai Xue - Institute of Software, CAS About I am a professor at the Key Laboratory of System Software, Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences since September 2021. In September 2024, I was appointed Deputy Director of the Key Laboratory of System Software. I received my B.Sc. degree from Tianjin University of Technology and Education in 2008, and Ph.D. degree from Beihang University in 2014.
